description:
Battle Royale - 3D Battleground Team Shooter FPS

 

The best 3D Battle Royale shooting game, dominate the battleground in this FPS. Collect guns, ammo, vest, and fight for your survival! Don’t waste time: the battlefield is constantly closing in at your heels. Survive and win! This is your battleground, this is your call for duty. Answer the call for arms, grab your weapons, and reach the battlefield: it’s time to shoot everything and show everyone who is the best player in this shooter FPS game!

 

! Early access!

Be aware: the game is still under heavy development. It’s currently in an early development stage. You can try it and leave feedback but be aware: they are different bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate to pools and discussions for future updates.

But Battle Royale - 3D Battleground Team Shooter FPS is not one of the usual Battle Royale. This game allows you to play various modes, both Battle Royale and Classical Shooter games, as well as campaigns with different missions. Collect characters, unlock new characters by leveling up, buy weapons, upgrade your character and weapons, and more.

 

Battle Royale features:

3 Battle Royale modes:

  • Classic Battle Royale: Play the Classic Battle Royale mode. It's you against the other players for a total of 20 simultaneous players! Choose the best weapons and the best strategy to survive and win!
  • Team Battle Royale: Play in Team Battle Royale mode. Two teams face each other and the one that manages to eliminate all the players of the opposing team wins.
  • Zombie Battle Royale: Play the Classic Battle Royale mode... But with the addition of ZOMBIE! In addition to the enemies, you will also have to watch out for the zombie invasion caused by an unprecedented apocalypse. The last player alive wins!
  • Classic Zombie Annihilation: Play the classic Zombie Annihilation mode. You are the only soldier left surrounded by zombies. Survive as many waves as possible and get the best score. The more hordes you defeat, the more rewards you will receive!
  • Team Zombie Annihilation: Play in team zombie annihilation mode. This time you are lucky: you are not the last survivor of the apocalypse, but you also have friends. Face off against hordes of zombies alongside 3 other friends. You are 4 against an infinity of zombies. The prizes are split, but the more hordes you defeat, the bigger the prizes will be!

 

Zombie Annihilation features:

The apocalypse has arrived, and now your task is to survive! In this game mode, you will face endless hordes of zombies. The more you survive, the more rewards you get!

2 Zombie Annihilation modes:

  • Classic Zombie Annihilation: Play the classic Zombie Annihilation mode. You are the only soldier left surrounded by zombies. Survive as many waves as possible and get the best score. The more hordes you defeat, the more rewards you will receive!
  • Team Zombie Annihilation: Play in team zombie annihilation mode. This time you are lucky: you are not the last survivor of the apocalypse, but you also have friends. Face off against hordes of zombies alongside 3 other friends. You are 4 against an infinity of zombies. The prizes are split, but the more hordes you defeat, the bigger the prizes will be!

  

Campaign features:

Find out what brought the apocalypse to the world. Immerse yourself in this dangerous world of zombies, and mission by mission, investigate until you reach the truth. Each mission will bring you rewards that will allow you to upgrade and better face the next missions.

 

Game features:

  • Different game modes: survival, campaign, team deathmatch, and more.
  • Lots of characters: unlock and collect a huge variety of characters, each with its own unique perks.
  • Optimized for mobile phones: this game runs smoothly on mobile phones, it’s been specially optimized to run smoothly even on old devices.
  • Huge arsenal of weapons and guns: Choose from a huge arsenal of weapons and guns. Find the weapons the best suit you and upgrade them as you prefer.
  • Huge map: a big map for a big game. Explore this huge map, explore, survive, shoot, defeat your enemies and win!
  • Constantly new updates: stay up to date on the latest news. This game is constantly updated, follow us on our social channels to stay updated on the latest news.
  • High-quality gameplay: you will have a ton of fun, the controls are easy to understand and highly customizable
  • Stunning 3d high-quality graphic. The PC’s graphic... On a mobile phone device!

 

Challenge your friends in this survival shooter game, and try to survive as long as possible. Kill zombies and collect weapons and ammo in this post apocalypse shooting game. Do whatever it takes to survive in this post apocalypse city. Use all the weapons you have (pistol, minigun, uzi, ak47, m4, shotgun, rocket launcher, RPG, mines, grenades, and so on) and kill all the walking dead zombies! Last day, last chance now is your turn!
